text: my name is Greta Gerwig and I am the
director of Lady Bird so this scene is
Laurie Metcalf and Saoirse Ronan playing
a mother and daughter and they are
shopping at thrift town which is an
actual location in Sacramento we spent a
lot of time trying to make this scene
look honest but beautiful and I thought
that the location was actually
incredibly beautiful it has these big
windows it gave us lots of Flair and
then also the silver hangers and the
depth and the colors of all the clothes
my cinematographer Sam levy he wanted to
get and I wanted to get a lot of head
room so we could get the fluorescence in
which was based on a photograph of a
grocery store by William Eggleston
the scene itself as they're fighting and
her mother is able to be nice to someone
else but she feels like not to her and
then in the moment when she finds the
dress they're best friends again because
they think that's how mothers and
daughters are with each other they fight
and they love really hard
